title: tjcbs
author: tjcbs
content: I used to think donating to a bitcoin reserve was a dumb idea. I was wrong, it's powerful as hell, not at all a sad second place to redenominating gold reserves or something. The debt worries everyone in this country, crossing political lines.Ask people to compete to erase it, by contributing bitcoin (directly or in $).Gamify it with leaderboards. By individual. By city and state. By company.A high ranking is a public signal of giving back, and of wealth. That is worth $$$. What company won't want to be top 10? 100? Number 1? Number 1 in their state, or city? They will compete for it.Everyone gets a ranking. Everyone can boost theirs, with just a few $.Rankings are denominated in bitcoin, not $. Contributing early is key!Allow DCAs, even if only a few dollars a month.Give every contributor a page showing their contributions and gains.This will also expose the population to participating in bitcoin, and to its value add over time.This could be a perpetual sat black hole.Even if other countries don't pick up on the idea. If successful, they certainly will!What do you think of this idea?And I know, I know, it would be rich for this administration in particular to ask citizens to help pay down the debt, when they in particular are one of the chief contributors, with the reckless and corrupt cuts/giveaways to the rich and corporations. As always, one works with what one has.
